title: How to manage apps connected to Google Drive (and why you should)
description: If you've allowed apps access to your Google Drive account over the years, you're going to want to know how to manage those apps, so you can revoke access when needed.

title: Former ByteDance exec says China can access TikTok user data, even when it's stored on US soil
description: In an amendment to his wrongful termination suit, Yintao Yu outlines his alleged witnessing of how ByteDance supplies user data to the CCP.

title: Google Cloud and Salesforce partner to help improve customer experience with AI
description: The two companies are coming together to analyze data with AI and help businesses create ads customers probably want to see.

title: LinkedIn is adding AI-powered tools to help marketing professionals
description: Creating headlines and copy for campaigns on LinkedIn just got easier. Here's how.

title: Adobe Express gets generative AI tools to level up your design experience
description: Designing and creating content on Adobe Express have been made easier with AI. Here's how.

title: Is your Google Nest camera randomly going offline? You're not alone
description: There's no official fix yet but there are a few things you can try.

title: I bought a $600 'smart' ice maker and it's as luxurious as I'd hoped
description: The GE Opal 2.0 is on the more premium end of the ice maker spectrum, but it features all the smarts to make it an exceptionally satisfying kitchen appliance.

title: iPhone envy? Here are 3 iOS 17 features already available on Android
description: Apple's upcoming iPhone version brings improvements to how you text, call, and share contacts -- much like what's already existed on Android.

title: The best portable jump starters of 2023
description: With one of the best portable jump starters in your roadside emergency kit, you won't have to wait around for someone with jumper cables to help you out if your car battery dies.

title: How Nvidia uses GPT-4 to make AI better at Minecraft
description: The Voyager program can both devise new challenges in the game, and then continuously refine strategies for success. Sometimes it hallucinates non-existent items, though, such as an "acacia axe."

title: How to create a Kanban board in Trello for a much more organized life
description: A Kanban board is an easy-to-use tool that can help you track tasks more efficiently. Here's how to create one with a free Trello account.

title: Mac renaissance: How Apple's chip transition yielded such an oddly configured Mac Pro
description: The new Mac Pro, which completes Apple's migration from Intel architecture, is far from a revolutionary device. In fact, it really only makes sense when you see how the design targets a handful of customers.

title: Singapore heats up data centers with operating standards for tropical climates
description: These new standards can potentially yield energy savings of between 2% and 5% for every 1 degree Celsius increase in such environments. Here's what to know.

title: This is the most versatile smart lock I've seen so far - and Apple users will love it
description: The Aqara U100 is one of the most highly anticipated smart home products of the year. Does it live up to the hype?

title: Instagram feed fix: How to see more of what you want (and less of what you don't)
description: Instagram's algorithms manage what you see. Here's how to control your view.

title: Singapore identifies six generative AI risks, sets up foundation to guide adoption
description: AI Verify Foundation will develop test toolkits that mitigate the risks of AI.

title: These Apple Music features in iOS 17 make me less envious of Spotify users
description: Some of Spotify's best (and most coveted) features are finally making it to Apple Music.
